short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension for creating and managing notes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your productivity with Noteoriouz Extension, the ultimate Chrome extension for seamless note-taking and reminders. Revolutionize the way you organize your thoughts, tasks, and important dates right from your browser.

üìù Effortless Note-Taking:
Quickly jot down ideas, to-dos, and important information with our intuitive note-taking feature. The minimalist design ensures a distraction-free writing experience.

‚è∞ Set Reminders with Ease:
Never miss a deadline or forget an important task again! Noteoriouz extension allows you to set timely reminders for your notes, keeping you on top of your schedule.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing "Noteoriouz Extension" extension.

Features:
- Save your notes
- Custom color for the notes
- Add reminder to your note
